short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your home page into a distraction-free Markdown editor. Get organized and productive with this easy-to-use extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser's home page into a simple and efficient Markdown editor with this extension. Take notes, write to-do lists, or brainstorm ideas directly in your browser with Markdown formatting. This extension provides a clean and minimalist interface that's perfect for distraction-free writing. Start taking notes right away with no setup required. Get organized and productive with this powerful yet easy-to-use Markdown extension.
